00016 subroutine parse_mols
00017 use orbitals
00018 use strings
00019 use parameters
00020 implicit none
00021 integer stat
00022 character(len=100) buf
00023 character*10 buff, bufff
00024 character(len=20) :: FMT, rFMT
00025 character*20 hstr
00026 character*20 out(6)
00027 
00028 real*8, allocatable :: crapbuf(:)
00029 
00030 integer iorb, i,j, iact
00031 integer nlA, k, nrA, nlB, nrB, nshift, nlD, nrD, nseg, imin, count, cnt
00032 logical CP
00033 
00034 real*8 expo
00035 integer expoint
00036 
00037 integer, external :: get_index
00038 
00039       ! Open files for parsing
00040       open(10,file="dimer.log", status="old")
00041       open(11,file="../molA/monomer.log", status="old")
00042       open(12,file="../molB/monomer.log", status="old")
00043 
00044       ! number of basis functions in molA
00045       do
00046          read(11,*,iostat=stat) buf, buff
00047          if (stat /= 0) exit
00048          if ( index(buf,'NBasis=') .ne. 0 ) then
00049             read(buff,*) nA
00050             exit
00051          end if
00052       end do
00053       close(11)
00054 
00055       write(*,*) "Basis functions in A:", nA
00056 
00057       ! number of basis functions in molB
00058       do
00059          read(12,*,iostat=stat) buf, buff
00060          if (stat /= 0) exit
00061          if ( index(buf,'NBasis=') .ne. 0 ) then
00062             read(buff,*) nB
00063             exit
00064          end if
00065       end do
00066       close(12)
00067 
00068       write(*,*) "Basis functions in B:", nB
00069 
00070       ! number of basis functions in dimer
00071       do
00072          read(10,*,iostat=stat) buf, buff
00073          if (stat /= 0) exit
00074          if ( index(buf,'NBasis=') .ne. 0 ) then
00075             read(buff,*) nD
00076             exit
00077          end if
00078       end do
00079       close(10)
00080 
00081       write(*,*) "Basis functions in D:", nD
00082 
00083       ! Consistency checks, check for CP/noCP basis or ERROR
00084       if (nD .ne. (nA+nB) ) then
00085          if ( (nD.ne.nA) .or. (nD .ne. nB)) then
00086             stop "Count of basis functions doesn't match. Failing."
00087          else
00088             CP=.true.
00089             nshift=0
00090          end if
00091       else
00092          CP=.false.
00093          nshift=nA
00094       end if
00095 
00096 
00097       write(*,*) "Counterpoise basis?", CP
00098 
00099 select case(QCP)
00100    case ('G')
00101 
00102       
00103       ! read from molecule A
00104       nAt = homoAsub+lumoAsub
00105       allocate(molAcoef(nAt,nD), molAener(nAt))
00106       molAcoef = 0.0d0
00107       molAener = 0.0d0
00108       nlA = nA/5
00109       nrA = nA-nlA*5
00110       open(8,file="../molA/fort.7",status='old')
00111       read(8,'(A8)') FMT
00112       do i = 1, homoAind(1)+lumoAsub
00113          read(8,"(a)") buf
00114          CALL PARSE(buf,'=',out,nseg)
00115          if (i .lt. homoAind(homoAsub) ) then
00116             do j = 1, nlA
00117                read(8,*) buf
00118             end do
00119             if (nrA .ne. 0 ) read(8,*) buf
00120          else
00121             iact = i-homoAind(homoAsub)+1
00122             read(out(2),*) molAener(iact)
00123             do j = 1, nlA
00124                read(8,FMT) molAcoef(iact,(j-1)*5+1:j*5)
00125             end do
00126             if (nrA .ne. 0) then
00127                write(hstr,'(I1)') nrA
00128                hstr = trim(hstr)
00129                rFMT = '('//hstr
00130                rFMT = trim(rFMT)//'D15.8)'
00131                read(8,rFMT) (molAcoef(iact,k),k=nA-nrA+1,nA)
00132             end if
00133          end if
00134       end do
00135       close(8)
00136       molAener = molAener*conv_Hrt_eV
00137 
00138 
00139       write(*,*) "Reading A done!"
00140 
00141       ! read from molecule B
00142       nBt = homoBsub+lumoBsub
00143       allocate(molBcoef(nBt,nD), molBener(nBt))
00144       molBcoef = 0.0d0
00145       molBener = 0.0d0
00146       nlB = nB/5
00147       nrB = nB-nlB*5
00148       open(8,file="../molB/fort.7",status='old')
00149       read(8,'(A8)') FMT
00150       do i = 1, homoBind(1)+lumoBsub
00151          read(8,'(a)') buf
00152          CALL PARSE(buf,'=',out,nseg)
00153          if (i .lt. homoBind(homoBsub) ) then
00154             do j = 1, nlB
00155                read(8,*) buf
00156             end do
00157             if (nrB .ne. 0 ) read(8,*) buf
00158          else
00159             iact = i-homoBind(homoBsub)+1
00160             read(out(2),*) molBener(iact)
00161             do j = 1, nlB
00162                read(8,FMT) molBcoef(iact,nshift+(j-1)*5+1:nshift+j*5)
00163             end do
00164             if (nrB .ne. 0) then
00165                write(hstr,'(I1)') nrB
00166                hstr = trim(hstr)
00167                rFMT = '('//hstr
00168                rFMT = trim(rFMT)//'D15.8)'
00169                read(8,rFMT) (molBcoef(iact,nshift+k),k=nB-nrB+1,nB)
00170             end if
00171          end if
00172       end do
00173       close(8)
00174       molBener = molBener*conv_Hrt_eV
00175 
00176       write(*,*) "Reading B done!"
00177    case ('GW')
00178 
00179       ! read from molecule A
00180       nAt = n_QP_A
00181       allocate(molAcoef(nAt,nD), molAener(nAt))
00182       molAcoef = 0.0d0
00183       molAener = 0.0d0
00184       nlA = nA/5
00185       nrA = nA-nlA*5
00186       open(8,file="../molA/fort.7",status='old')
00187       read(8,'(A8)') FMT
00188       do i = 1, nAt
00189          read(8,"(a)") buf
00190          CALL PARSE(buf,'=',out,nseg)
00191          iact = i
00192          read(out(2),*) molAener(iact)
00193          do j = 1, nlA
00194             read(8,FMT) molAcoef(iact,(j-1)*5+1:j*5)
00195          end do
00196          if (nrA .ne. 0) then
00197             write(hstr,'(I1)') nrA
00198             hstr = trim(hstr)
00199             rFMT = '('//hstr
00200             rFMT = trim(rFMT)//'D15.8)'
00201             read(8,rFMT) (molAcoef(iact,k),k=nA-nrA+1,nA)
00202          end if
00203       end do
00204       close(8)
00205       molAener = molAener*conv_Hrt_eV
00206 
00207       write(*,*) "Reading A done (GW)!"
00208 
00209       ! read from molecule B
00210       nBt = n_QP_B
00211       allocate(molBcoef(nBt,nD), molBener(nBt))
00212       molBcoef = 0.0d0
00213       molBener = 0.0d0
00214       nlB = nB/5
00215       nrB = nB-nlB*5
00216       open(8,file="../molB/fort.7",status='old')
00217       read(8,'(A8)') FMT
00218       do i = 1, nBt
00219          read(8,'(a)') buf
00220          CALL PARSE(buf,'=',out,nseg)
00221          iact = i
00222          read(out(2),*) molBener(iact)
00223          do j = 1, nlB
00224             read(8,FMT) molBcoef(iact,nshift+(j-1)*5+1:nshift+j*5)
00225          end do
00226          if (nrB .ne. 0) then
00227             write(hstr,'(I1)') nrB
00228             hstr = trim(hstr)
00229             rFMT = '('//hstr
00230             rFMT = trim(rFMT)//'D15.8)'
00231             read(8,rFMT) (molBcoef(iact,nshift+k),k=nB-nrB+1,nB)
00232          end if
00233       end do
00234       close(8)
00235       molBener = molBener*conv_Hrt_eV
00236 
00237       write(*,*) "Reading B done (GW)!"
00238       
00239    end select
00240 
00241       ! read from dimer
00242    call system("cat fort.7 | grep Alpha | wc -l > NORB")
00243    open(27,file="NORB", status="old")
00244    read(27,*) nDt
00245    close(27)
00246    allocate( dimcoef(nDt,nD), fock_diag(nDt,nDt) )
00247       dimcoef   = 0.0d0
00248       fock_diag = 0.0d0
00249       nlD       = nD/5
00250       nrD       = nD-nlD*5
00251       open(8,file="fort.7",status='old')
00252       read(8,'(A8)') FMT
00253       do i = 1, nDt
00254          read(8,'(a)') buf
00255          CALL PARSE(buf,'=',out,nseg)
00256          read(out(2),*) fock_diag(i,i)
00257          do j = 1, nlD
00258             read(8,FMT) dimcoef(i,(j-1)*5+1:j*5)
00259          end do
00260          if (nrD .ne. 0) then
00261             write(hstr,'(I1)') nrD
00262             hstr = trim(hstr)
00263             rFMT = '('//hstr
00264             rFMT = trim(rFMT)//'D15.8)'
00265             read(8,rFMT) (dimcoef(i,k),k=nD-nrD+1,nD)
00266          end if
00267       end do
00268       close(8)
00269       fock_diag = fock_diag*conv_Hrt_eV
00270 
00271 
00272       write(*,*) "Reading D done!"
00273 
00274       ! read overlap matrix from dimer LOG-file (this will be nasty!)
00275       allocate( S(nD,nD) )
00276       S = 0.0d0
00277       open(8,file="dimer.log",status='old')
00278       do 
00279          read(8,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00280          if (stat /= 0) stop "Error reading overlap matrix."
00281          if ( index(buf,'Overlap') .ne. 0 ) exit 
00282       end do
00283 
00284       j=0
00285       imin=1
00286       ! go through all cols
00287       do while (j .le. nD)
00288          read(8,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00289          ! reset line counter
00290          i=imin
00291          ! go through line
00292          do while ( i .le. nD )
00293             read(8,'(a)',iostat=stat) buf
00294             CALL PARSE(buf,' ',out,nseg)
00295             read(out(2:nseg),*) (S(i,j+k),k=1,nseg-1)
00296             read(out(2:nseg),*) (S(j+k,i),k=1,nseg-1)
00297             i=i+1
00298          end do
00299       
00300          j = j+5
00301          imin = imin +5
00302 
00303       end do
00304 
00305       
00306       close(8)
00307 
00308 
00309 
00310 
00311       write(*,*) "Reading S done!"
00312       write(111,*) S
00313 !   end select
00314 
00315 end subroutine parse_mols
00316 
00317 integer function get_index(i,j)
00318 implicit none
00319 integer i,j, iact, jact, div
00320 
00321 if (j .gt. i ) then
00322    iact=j
00323    jact=i
00324 else
00325    iact = i
00326    jact =j
00327 end if
00328 
00329 div = iact/2
00330 
00331 if (mod(iact,2).eq.0) then
00332    get_index = iact*(div-1)+div+jact
00333 else
00334    get_index = iact*(div)+jact
00335 end if
00336 
00337 end function get_index
00338
